name: IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise V18 with IBM HTTP Server - VMware vSphere
description: This template deploys IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise V18 with an integrated IBM HTTP Server.

metadata.displayName: IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise V18 with IBM HTTP Server
metadata.longDescription: This template deploys IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise V18 with an integrated IBM HTTP Server.

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
Virtual Machine 1:
IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise V18 - Deployment Manager and Custom Node, one cluster member
Virtual Machine 2:
IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise V18 - Custom Node, one cluster member
Virtual Machine 3:
IBM HTTP Server

bullets.title: Software Deployed
bullets.description:
IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise V18
IBM HTTP Server V8.5.5

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. Users are responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads before they deploy templates.
2. Detailed system requirements for IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise V18 - https://www.ibm.com/software/reports/compatibility/clarity/index.html
3. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise V18 - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SS8JB4_18.0.0
4. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
